title: David Levithan - Every Day
description:

A has made peace with that, even established guidelines by which to live: Never get too attached. Avoid being noticed. Do not interfere.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all fine until the morning that A wakes up in the body of Justin and meets JustinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s girlfriend, Rhiannon. From that moment, the rules by which A has been living no longer apply. Because finally A has found someone he wants to be withÃ¢â‚¬â€day in, day out, day after day.

With his new novel, David Levithan has pushed himself to new creative heights.
